# 牛客产品经理校招8大必考技能修炼之道 

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/niuke-chanpin-jingli-xiaozhao-8-da-bikao-jineng-xiulian-zhidao
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/niuke-chanpin-jingli-xiaozhao-8-da-bikao-jineng-xiulian-zhidao
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install niuke-chanpin-jingli-xiaozhao-8-da-bikao-jineng-xiulian-zhidao
niuke-chanpin-jingli-xiaozhao-8-da-bikao-jineng-xiulian-zhidao <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g niuke-chanpin-jingli-xiaozhao-8-da-bikao-jineng-xiulian-zhidao
niuke-chanpin-jingli-xiaozhao-8-da-bikao-jineng-xiulian-zhidao <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
